originalText.text: We hired Metro Yacht Charters for a large company event back in July!  Having worked with Laurie in the past, I knew that we were getting the best in the business. They did not disappoint. Everything turned out perfect. My guests were thrilled. It was a perfect evening out on the Hudson!  Thanks, Laurie and Metro Yacht team for an amazing job. We will be using you again.

text.text: We hired Metro Yacht Charters for a large company event back in July!  Having worked with Laurie in the past, I knew that we were getting the best in the business. They did not disappoint. Everything turned out perfect. My guests were thrilled. It was a perfect evening out on the Hudson!  Thanks, Laurie and Metro Yacht team for an amazing job. We will be using you again.

originalText.text: This is THE best kept secret in all of New York. We had our daughter's wedding aboard one of their yachts. Laurie took total control of the situation and everything about the day was beyond perfect, even the weather (I don't think she had anything to do with that, but ya never know...). Attention to details, friendliness of wait staff and other yacht personnel, food, beverages, cleanliness and classiness of the boat earned highest grades from all of the guests. Even the wedding photographer claimed he had never had as much fun as he did on this yacht adventure! I highly recommend checking out what Laurie could do to raise your event to new heights.

originalText.text: We had an absolutely wonderful time! The service was excellent - there were lots of personal and lovely touches- and the guests had a uniformly enjoyable experience. Thank you!

text.text: We had an absolutely wonderful time! The service was excellent - there were lots of personal and lovely touches- and the guests had a uniformly enjoyable experience. Thank you!

originalText.text: If you are looking for the perfect venue that will offer you an experience of a lifetime, search no more. Let Laurie help you choose from a fleet of beautiful ships that would be perfect for you.  She is absolutely amazing in helping you plan the most memorable event! ( and no... I am not getting paid for this review!! LOL) This Saturday, my husband and I had the most incredible experience for our wedding! There is just nothing better than cruising on a private yacht in NYC harbor, looking at the skyline, seeing the Statue of Liberty up close, watching the sunset, eating delicious food, while music is playing with a staff that caters to everyone’s needs. I cannot thank you enough for a memory we will always cherish! My family and friends have not stopped talking about how great everything was! It was truly spectacular!

originalText.text: Working with Metro Yacht Charters (and Laurie specifically) has been a fabulous experience. Laurie was highly responsive and helpful throughout our experience working together. We planned a 1000 people boat cruise and everything turned out beautifully.
